```py
>>> df = pd.DataFrame({'foo': ['one', 'one', 'one', 'two', 'two',
...                            'two'],
...                    'bar': ['A', 'B', 'C', 'A', 'B', 'C'],
...                    'baz': [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6],
...                    'zoo': ['x', 'y', 'z', 'q', 'w', 't']})
>>> df
 foo   bar  baz  zoo
0   one   A    1    x
1   one   B    2    y
2   one   C    3    z
3   two   A    4    q
4   two   B    5    w
5   two   C    6    t 
```

```py
>>> df.pivot(index='foo', columns='bar', values='baz')
bar  A   B   C
foo
one  1   2   3
two  4   5   6 
```

```py
>>> df.pivot(index='foo', columns='bar')['baz']
bar  A   B   C
foo
one  1   2   3
two  4   5   6 
```

```py
>>> df.pivot(index='foo', columns='bar', values=['baz', 'zoo'])
 baz       zoo
bar   A  B  C   A  B  C
foo
one   1  2  3   x  y  z
two   4  5  6   q  w  t 
```

```py
>>> df.pivot(index="lev1", columns=["lev2", "lev3"], values="values")
lev2    1         2
lev3    1    2    1    2
lev1
1     0.0  1.0  2.0  NaN
2     4.0  3.0  NaN  5.0 
```

```py
>>> df.pivot(index=["lev1", "lev2"], columns=["lev3"], values="values")
 lev3    1    2
lev1  lev2
 1     1  0.0  1.0
 2  2.0  NaN
 2     1  4.0  3.0
 2  NaN  5.0 
```

```py
>>> df = pd.DataFrame({"foo": ['one', 'one', 'two', 'two'],
...                    "bar": ['A', 'A', 'B', 'C'],
...                    "baz": [1, 2, 3, 4]})
>>> df
 foo bar  baz
0  one   A    1
1  one   A    2
2  two   B    3
3  two   C    4 
```

```py
>>> df.pivot(index='foo', columns='bar', values='baz')
Traceback (most recent call last):
  ...
ValueError: Index contains duplicate entries, cannot reshape 
```
